author: Nicole Williams
comment: This app was great when I first got it several phones ago. Ever since Android 5.0, it has been inconsistent. I made sure that the navigation icon remains enabled at all times, but the app is still buggy. It won't always restart with my phone, location-based profile changes no longer happen, and sometimes it's on but still won't change profiles according to preset parameters. I used to love PhoneWeaver and now it barely works
title: No longer works consistently

author: Dimitris Koutras
comment: The app keeps asking for registration, despite my purchase. All emails to developer's support remain unanswered. This is a fraud, don't buy this app !
title: Zero Support !!!

author: dima kotsikau
comment: Widget 1*1 became too big. The lable is not visible. Besides, some functions are not working, like switching off-line mode.
title: Widget

author: Chris Hoppas
comment: None of the profiles switch automatically.  Makes no difference if it is set to switch by time. location or connection type none of these work.  I have to manually switch profiles all day which defeats the purpose of this app.  Uninstalling.
title: Nothing automatic about it

author: Peter T Cormack
comment: I don't know why no apps can actually turn on gps, but unfortunately, this is no exception. Also, the wife keeps turning itself on, even when the profile turns it off. Uninstalled until these issues are fixed.
title: Doesn't turn on gps!

author: Jeff Jackson
comment: They make you pay for it again when you move to a new phone.

reply.author: Sesma Europe
reply.content: Be sure you use the same Google account on both phones and the app will be automatically registered

title: Won't transfer to new phone

author: meletios meletiou
comment: Needs on off function

author: A Google User
comment: I used to love this app before they abandoned it and are forcing people who purchased it to pay again despite no future developement. Use Locale or Tasker instead.
title: Stay Away!!!

author: Mani
comment: With JB 4.3 Nexus 4, it struggles to switch off the WiFi and in Airplane mode it switches most things off but leaves the Data on.
title: Not the best.

comment: This app with my LiveView blows everything out of the water. You don't even need a smartwatch actually. Location-based profiles work perfectly. I mean perfectly. I'm amazed.
title: Amazing

author: Michele Turner
comment: Purchased the actual app.  Problems with phone unrelated to app required a factory reset. Contacted customer service several times to get app reinstalled, they never responded.  They have my money and I don't have the app.  I would not do any business with this developer again.
title: Bad customer service, money lost.

author: kareem utley
comment: Glitchy as all hell, why are you in airplane mode right now? Why?
title: No replacement for smart actions

author: Keith Hiap
comment: Gps mode can't be activated. Wifi mode once enable, it can't be switch off.
title: Need updates before I decided to purchase the app

author: Khaled Wazaefi
comment: When turning to a profile with Wi-Fi ON i get the "avoiding poor connecrion" anf my wifi goes to error. I am on Jelly Bean HTC One X, uninstalled and moved to another app
title: Wifi issue

author: Alex Chen
comment: Was excellence. But no update for solving airplane mode issue for 4.2+. I have changed to tasker.
title: Airplane  mode was no more supported.

author: A Google User
comment: Its still the best )and easiest to use) app for profiles, but ... It the design could use an update, especially the widget.  Is it possible to support better looking widgets ? I would love to have the ability to make the 4x1 transparant, or change colors or hide background and only show (1-colored) icons.
title: Still the best

author: Krzysiek Piotrowski
comment: Looks more complicated than smart action from Motorola
title: Location trigger and time

author: anumakonda aneesh
comment: Good

author: A Google User
comment: why does it need permissions to read contacts? app has a lot permissions which are not necessary...
title: it read contacts

author: A Google User
comment: Worked for twenty minutes. Went outside, changed location, stopped disabling lockscreen. Restarted, said profile was active but still enabled lockscreen. Uninstalled. Not the quality i was hoping for.
title: SGII

author: A Google User
comment: On my Galaxy S3 the GPS never toggles on or off as I switch from home to car mode. It works fline to switch BT on and off, but no affect on GPS.
title: GPS not changing

author: A Google User
comment: Separate rules & profiles and allow and/or operations for rules.  I would buy this app, if this happened!
title: Needs Rule Engine Upgrade

author: A Google User
comment: Had a problem with multiple accounts and reg key for the 3.99 version.  They resolved it quickly and painlessly.  I wish triggers could use "or" condition, so you could specify conditions and say "if any of these conditions are met then use this profile"  That way if gps is off or wifi signal is temporarily lost, it would still be in the correct profile.
title: Prompt Service

author: A Google User
comment: Wouldn't pay 3.99 for it. Confusing ui and  documentation. kinda hard to setup.  Prob just needs better ui to show more succinctly what each Profile would do . Doesn't crash on my evo.
title: Might work

author: A Google User
comment: People that rate this poor don't know how to set it up properly. Would be lost without this app.
title: Awesome

author: A Google User
comment: What I always wanted and more!
title: Fantastic

author: A Google User
comment: This could be a great app with just a little more attention to detail. Setting wallpaper is useless if you can't also set the lock screen wallpaper and live wallpaper, for example. And location triggers need reverse logic, for example for leaving home.
title: Good but not quite great

author: A Google User
comment: Still enacts profiles that I can't see in the list after a crash. I like how simple it is.
title: Constantly crashes, but simple and easy to use.

author: A Google User
comment: I only have timed profiles, but my battery is down to 50% by lunchtime.  Uninstalling and back to my old profile app
title: Battery drain

author: A Google User
comment: GOD and Cell location need to be seperate. GOD kills your battery. There are better profile apps on the market.
title: Cell location

author: A Google User
comment: Does everything flawlessly.
title: Better than others!

author: A Google User
comment: I liked it at first but in the end decided to uninstall. i used the application to disable the lock screen when docked.however many times it didn't manage to move to the correct profile and stayed locked. i had a profile for meetings where according to my calendar it silenced my phone according to my calendar this part worked great. i saw that there are other applications that can change the profile according to the dock state and the calendar so i decided to give them a try.
title: Nice, but not robust enough

author: A Google User
comment: I wanted something to unlock my phone in car but sounds like google doesn't support. Other features seem great.
title: Great but not what I need

author: A Google User
comment: It doesn't work on HTC One XL

author: A Google User
comment: Great app. I tried every possible profiles app but this is definitely the easiest to use and must reliable one.
title: Great!

author: A Google User
comment: This worked great until the 2.01 update on July 5. Now it doesn't automatically switch when detecting WiFi. Also, the white theme is a little annoying, why not have a choice between light or dark?
title: No longer automatic

author: A Google User
comment: This is a really good app that did just what I wanted. Unfortunately, on a typical day it uses about 7 or 8 percent of my battery
title: Very good, but heavy on battery

author: A Google User
comment: Trial ended after only 2 days of use, altough description claims 14 days.  Good app otherwise
title: Trial ends too soon

author: A Google User
comment: The best Profile Manager that I have found for Android.

author: A Google User
comment: Direct focus on profiles on my phone. During night, I don't get loud calls or emails. In car, my GPS and Bluetooth are on. I contacted their support, quick, responsive, new updates. I had no problems when I needed to change my device and upgrade the licence code. I like the product.
title: Perfect. Excellent support. Compact.
